response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be a significant asset for you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
